ModMetaData.name: Polarisbloc - Security Force
ModMetaData.author: Vaniat
ModMetaData.description:
<color=#FF3300>Requirement: Polarisbloc - Core LAB</color>

The security forces belonging to the Polarisbloc provide security support for the Polarisbloc. At the same time, it is also ordered by Polarisbloc to carry out the untold task.They are usually friendly to anyone until someone has annoyed them.

And a storyteller named Erica will play with you.Erica is the child of the aristocracy in the core world.Erica liked the sudden setback in the bland story, and she found it very interesting.

Now you have a chance to get a technology to make polaris - II shield belt by unscramble memory stick.


Enjoy it!
